attributes.action: Change The name of isis to Nisis! It doesn't Represent Muslims/Islamic Religion!
attributes.additional_details: This anti-campaign Petition should be promoted & shared by moderate/normal Muslims  & even their non Muslim friends all over the world to show our rejection/denial & refusal  of the  extremist methodology of those radically sick people hiding behind Islam , & equally in solidarity with all the victims of their criminal attacks anywhere throughout the globe . SO , to all Respected Media : " Please STOP referring to  them as ISIS , from Now on lets all call them : NISIS " . PLEASE sign and Pass on
attributes.background: We would like to initiate a huge worldly campaign or rather anti -campaign to rename ISIS to NISIS , meaning :  " the Non -Islamic State in Iraq & Syria " .

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking the media to take this action. That's not something that the UK Government and Parliament can make happen.

If you would like the Government and Parliament to change the way they refer to ISIS, you could start a petition asking for that.
